# currentOffset

**Instance Property**

The position within the resource of the next byte.

## Declaration

```swift
var currentOffset: Int64 { get }
```

## Discussion

When incrementally loading data you should begin loading at this offset, returning the data by invoking the [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVAssetResourceLoadingDataRequest/respond(with:)] method. Bytes previous to this value have already been provided.

## Providing data to a request

- **respond(with:)**: Provides data to the loading request.
- **requestedLength**: The length, in bytes, of the data requested.
- **requestedOffset**: The position within the resource of the first byte requested.
- **requestsAllDataToEndOfResource**: A Boolean value that indicates the entire remaining length of the resource from the offest to the end of the resource is being requested.
